name: LAAccessControlOperation
desc: Operations to be evaluated for access control.

items.name: case createItem
items.desc: Specifies that access control is used for item creation.

items.name: case useItem
items.desc: Specifies that access control is used for accessing an existing item.

items.name: case createKey
items.desc: Specifies that access control is used for key creation.

items.name: case useKeySign
items.desc: Specifies that access control is used for accessing an existing key.

items.name: case useKeyDecrypt
items.desc: Specifies that access control is used for data decryption using existing key.

items.name: case useKeyKeyExchange
items.desc: Specifies that access control is used for key exchange.
